body_html: Essentially what I end up doing is writing a function that iterates over the params of the model and changes the module's train flag (dropout in this case) manually instead of doing model.eval().
body_text: Essentially what I end up doing is writing a function that iterates over the params of the model and changes the module's train flag (dropout in this case) manually instead of doing model.eval().
body: Essentially what I end up doing is writing a function that iterates over the params of the model and changes the module's train flag (dropout in this case) manually instead of doing model.eval().
